ygData.subject: PLing a Monk
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I need some PLing info and I was hoping some of you could give me a hand. I have a irl friend has a monk that I am PLing atm with my level 52 Shaman.
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

I need some PLing info and I was hoping some of you could give me a
hand.

I have a irl friend has a monk that I am PLing atm with my level 52
Shaman. His monk is level 33 and is hunting in OT and the experience
is pretty darn good (Killing Tigers, Sarnak Knights and other
red /con mobs). I am casting Str, Agi, Dex, Sta, Chloro, Guardian
(AC Buff), 'tuna (HP Buff), Alacrity, SoW and Burst of Str (Short
term Str buff that stacks with Str) on the Monk. On the mob, I cast
an Melee debuff (-AC, -Str) and a Turgur's (Slow spell). When the
mob gets less than half health, I send in my pet to help him kill the
mob. I think I can get him to level 40 in the next few days.

My question is: Where can I take this Monk to level him from 40 -
50ish very fast?

I was thinking of the Ice Giants outside of Perma. They are level
38 - 42, they are a 6 min spawn but they have a lot of HPs, high AC
and do a ton of damage per hit.

your friend,

Majeot
Fennin Ro
